EmailTemplate.name: Client Forum 2016
EmailTemplate.subject: SALT Client Forum 2016 - join us again this year!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}:
We are excited to announce the 2016 SALT Client Forums!
This year's agenda offers sessions on topics you told us are most important, with ample time to connect with colleagues, share ideas and learn from one another.
The Client Forum is the place to fine tune your engagement efforts and help shape your plan for the upcoming year, and I hope you can join us. Registration is free. Check out the agenda and all of the locations at http://bit.ly/2016ClientForum.
Sincerely,
Gina Lucente-Cole Client Forum Event Manager
P.S. Feel free to forward this invitation to others on your campus.
American Student Assistance, ASA, SALT, Money knowledge for college – and beyond, and corresponding logos are trademarks or registered trademarks of American Student Assistance.
